short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Cut The Rope Holiday Gift right on Chromeâ„¢ Browser! Offline and Popup Version, without internet required!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Cut the Rope: Holiday Gift, the festive edition of the popular puzzle game, is now available on the Chrome Extension platform, allowing players to celebrate the holidays with Om Nom right from their web browser. In this delightful spin-off, players can enjoy a special holiday-themed adventure filled with candy, gifts, and joyful challenges.

In Cut the Rope: Holiday Gift, players join Om Nom as he embarks on a quest to unwrap festive presents and satisfy his sweet tooth. The gameplay mechanics remain familiar, with players cutting ropes and solving puzzles to deliver the candy to Om Nom. However, this time, the levels are adorned with colorful holiday decorations and festive elements.

As players progress through the game, they will encounter new and exciting challenges, including snowflakes, Christmas ornaments, and other holiday-themed obstacles. Timing and strategy are crucial as players aim to collect stars while navigating through the intricately designed levels.

The game retains the intuitive touch or mouse controls that made the original Cut the Rope so enjoyable. Players can swipe or click to cut ropes, interact with objects, and guide the candy to its destination. The physics-based gameplay adds a touch of excitement and unpredictability to the puzzles.

Cut the Rope: Holiday Gift on Chrome Extension boasts vibrant and cheerful visuals, capturing the festive spirit of the holiday season. The levels are beautifully decorated with sparkling lights, snow, and other holiday-themed elements, creating a joyful and immersive experience. The holiday-inspired music and sound effects further enhance the cheerful atmosphere.

With its festive theme, challenging puzzles, and lovable characters, Cut the Rope: Holiday Gift on Chrome Extension offers a delightful and addictive holiday gaming experience. So, get into the holiday spirit, unwrap the gifts, and indulge in the sweet adventure with Om Nom in this festive puzzle game!
